platform.title: Command Center for Your Operation
platform.subtitle: Unified control panel with real-time operational variables, cryptographically sealed digital evidence, and auditable reports.
platform.securitySubtitle: Every data point is protected with AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit, SHA-256 sealing, and immutable chain of custody.
platform.sec1Desc: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit. Compliance with Colombian data protection standards (Law 1581/2012).
platform.sec2Desc: Every event is cryptographically sealed with SHA-256 hash, timestamped, and stored in a verifiable immutable ledger.
platform.sec3Desc: Complete audit log with traceability of who, when, and from where accessed or modified each record.
platform.sec4Desc: Logical segregation per organization with Row Level Security. Each tenant operates in a fully isolated data space.
platform.apiSubtitle: Integrate CELLVI with your ERP, TMS, or dispatch system. Real-time webhooks, OAuth2, and OpenAPI 3.1 documentation.
platform.api1Desc: 50+ documented endpoints with OpenAPI 3.1, semantic versioning, cursor pagination, and configurable rate limiting.
platform.api2Desc: Push notifications with HMAC-SHA256 signature for telemetry events, alerts, geofences, and status changes.
platform.api3Desc: Robust authentication with granular scopes: telemetry:read, alerts:write, evidence:verify, admin:manage.
platform.api4Desc: SDKs for Python, Node.js, and .NET. Complete sandbox environment for development and testing without affecting production.

pricing.fairUseSubtitle: Transparent rules to ensure service quality for all clients.
pricing.fair_rule1_body: Each plan includes a daily event cap per asset (1 event/minute for SMB, 2/min for Professional, 4/min for Business). Events exceeding 150% of the limit for 3 consecutive days will trigger an upgrade notification. Service is never cut: excess events are queued.
pricing.fair_rule2_body: Telemetry data is retained per plan (90, 180, or 365 days). Sealed digital evidence is retained indefinitely on all plans. Data beyond the retention period is archived in cold storage with on-demand access.
pricing.fair_rule3_body: API calls are limited per plan (10Kâ€“200K/month). Requests exceeding the limit receive a 429 response with Retry-After header. Enterprise has no fixed limit but adaptive throttling based on tenant capacity.
pricing.fair_rule4_body: Satellite messages are billed per transmitted unit. One message equals one position report (â‰¤ 50 bytes). OTA firmware or remote configuration messages count as 3x standard messages. Differentiated rates apply by coverage region.
pricing.fair_rule5_body: The CELLVI platform cannot be sublicensed or resold without an active Partner agreement. API access does not authorize creating derivative products that compete with CELLVI. Authorized Partners have co-branding rights per their tier.
pricing.fair_rule6_body: ASEGURAR LTDA reserves the right to suspend accounts that: (a) generate artificial traffic to manipulate metrics, (b) use the API for mass scraping, (c) share credentials between organizations, or (d) violate data protection laws (Law 1581/2012). Before any suspension, a notification is issued with 72 hours for correction.

faq.title: We Answer Your Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our enterprise clients.
faq.sla_a: We guarantee 99.9% uptime SLA. In case of non-compliance, automatic credits proportional to downtime are applied per plan.
faq.security_q: How is my telemetry data protected?
faq.security_a: All data is encrypted with AES-256 at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit. Each event is sealed with SHA-256 and stored in a verifiable immutable chain of custody.
faq.integration_q: Can I integrate CELLVI with my ERP or TMS?
faq.integration_a: Yes. We offer a RESTful API v2 with 50+ endpoints documented in OpenAPI 3.1, HMAC-SHA256 signed webhooks, and SDKs for Python, Node.js, and .NET.
faq.support_a: Support varies by plan: business hours (SMB), dedicated (Professional), 24/7 with <15 min SLA (Business/Enterprise). All include documentation and knowledge center access.
faq.compliance_q: Do you comply with Colombian regulations?
faq.compliance_a: Yes. Network authorized by MinTIC, GPS providers registered with National Police and RUNT, official RISTRA integration, and Law 1581/2012 data protection compliance.
faq.data_q: How long is my data retained?
faq.data_a: Depends on plan: 90 days (SMB), 180 days (Professional), 365 days (Business), custom (Enterprise). Sealed digital evidence is retained indefinitely.
faq.satellite_a: Yes, as an add-on. Iridium/Globalstar coverage for areas without cellular network. Billed per transmitted message with differentiated regional rates.
faq.coldchain_q: How does cold chain monitoring work?
faq.coldchain_a: IoT temperature and humidity sensors with automatic deviation alerts, INVIMA-auditable records, and automatic reports per vehicle.
